title: Meet up
description: Learning to code with a group of people that meets every other day

bullets.text: Follow a structured syllabus & plan with.
Collaborate with students all over the world in real time.

students.title: Meet students from all over the world
students.subTitle: 120 people took this course and 63 are online right now
students.description: Some of our students are open to speak with others any time, by pressing this button you will be able to schedule a meeting with one of them

mentors.title: We support you in your journey, wherever you are
mentors.subTitle: There are +6 mentors online and available right now.
mentors.description: Some of our students are open to speak with others any time, by pressing this button you will be able to schedule a meeting with one of them
mentors.hint: Click any mentor for more information

events.title: We take online education to another level.
events.subTitle: Live clases, coding sessions, workshops and hangouts every few hours
events.description: During the pre-work you learn some basic CSS and HTML, and hopefully how to use the flex-box to create simple layouts.

previewModules.title: Take a look at the most relevant modules of our coding bootcamp

list.title: HTML/CSS
list.description: During the pre-work you learn some basic CSS and HTML, and hopefully how to use the flex-box to create simple layouts. The first day we will review the pre-work completion and introduce a more evolved CSS that enables amazing layouts and the amazing Bootstrap framework that will make you life so much easier with the "component oriented" approach.
